summary: App for managing a trading card portfolio, including card rarity and workflows for adding/selling cards.

existing_features.title: Add a React Query hook that fetches the new backend sold-cards balance aggregation and caches it under a stable query key scoped to the logged-in principal.
Update the Portfolio page to include a second summary/overview section that displays the aggregated sold-cards balance (total purchase costs minus total sale proceeds) for sold cards.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a second portfolio overview that shows an overall balance for sold cards: total purchase prices minus total sale prices across all sold cards.

Add a backend query endpoint that returns an aggregated sold-cards balance for the caller, computed as (sum of purchase costs) minus (sum of sale prices) across all cards with transactionType == #sold.

projectName: Add sold-cards balance overview to Portfolio
